patient_info: Cardiomegaly,Dyspnea,Abdominal distention,Exercise intolerance,Poor appetite,Myocarditis,Increased circulating NT-proBNP concentration
golden_diagnosis: Neonatal Marfan syndrome,Marfan syndrome,马方综合征/Marfan syndrome; MFS/Marfan syndrome,马方综合征/Marfan syndrome; MFS/Marfan syndrome
predict_diagnosis:
1. Hypertrophic cardiomyopathy
2. Dilated cardiomyopathy
3. Heart failure with preserved ejection fraction (HFpEF)
4. Peripartum cardiomyopathy
5. Inflammatory cardiomyopathy (including myocarditis)
6. Cardiac tamponade
7. restrictive cardiomyopathy
8. Amyloidosis
9. Endocarditis
10. Pulmonary hypertension associated with heart disease

Each of these conditions can present with cardiomegaly, dyspnea, abdominal distention, exercise intolerance, poor appetite, and increased circulating NT-proBNP concentration to varying degrees. It is important to note that further clinical evaluation, laboratory testing, imaging studies, and potentially biopsy would be necessary to confirm the diagnosis.
